info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 04 at 4:03PM CDT until October 04 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FOARD...SOUTHWESTERN WILBARGER AND SOUTHEASTERN HARDEMAN COUNTIES... At 403 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles south of Chillicothe to 4 miles southwest of Lockett to 9 miles south of Thalia, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Lockett, Medicine Mound, Thalia, Oklaunion, Grayback, and Rayland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: These storms are producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
